sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>When taking a Field Commander action, the character may affect allies equal to twice his Presence. In addition, he may spend one triumph generated on his Leadership checks to allow one ally to suffer 1 strain to perform an action, rather than a maneuver.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <name>Field commander (improved)</name> <number>TAL0001044</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:05:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2d9ed320db2e0c542901de90cf961977</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:05:31</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
